bioghist.p: Donald Pizer is Pierce Butler Professor of English at Tulane University. He is the author of The Novels of Theodore Dreiser: A Critical Study. He has also edited a number of works by and about Dreiser, including Theodore Dreiser: A Selection of Uncollected Prose (1977).

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of photocopies of correspondence and articles by Dreiser, dating from 1871 to 1945, compiled by Donald Pizer. Some of the letter were written while Dreiser was editor of The Delineator and refer to articles or proposed articles for that publication; other letters relate to his own writings and their publication, and to national and world affairs. The articles in the collection are from various newspapers and magazines. The copies were made from holdings in several repositories.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
